comments.author: COINAMITE
comments.created_time: July 01, 2022, 08:57:40 AMLast edit: July 01, 2022, 09:14:11 AM by COINAMITE
comments.body: I would like to try out with the 5000$ AWS Credits for 450.Can we please use an escrow? I've done some research and there is a user named MinerJones AKA MJ.He's apparently the best escrow.If this should work then I transfer the funds to him and we go on a google meet and I share the screen while adding the promotional code. And if it works then he gives the funds to you.UPDATE: After talking to the user he has now run out of stock. I asked for middle man / escrow. User agreed to that but now he ran out of stock.

comments.author: Varioants
comments.body: Thanks For Understanding Me . currently have account only.
